title: A Glimmer of Hope (with Joey Jones)
itunes:title: A Glimmer of Hope (with Joey Jones)
description:
Cicero Group Strategic Counsel and former Theresa May spokesperson Joey Jones tells Bloomberg's Caroline Hepker and Sebastian Salek how he thinks Brexit will end, as Jean-Claude Juncker sparks hope for a deal. Bloomberg's Ian Wishart joins from Brussels, and Stuart Biggs wraps up a busy week of Supreme Court action.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
